name: Akkhan's Manacles
flavorText: "Crusaders are unburdened by the tedium of a worldly life, but they must still be bound by charity, duty, and Akarat's will." -Akkhan
flavorTextHtml: "Crusaders are unburdened by the tedium of a worldly life, but they must still be bound by charity, duty, and Akarat's will." -Akkhan

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Blessed Shield damage is increased by 442% for the first enemy it hits. (Crusader Only) [400 - 500]%
